channel.title: Multiple teleport options
channel.description:
Ok. So i have a portal. And I have put multiple options, i have made in perm spawn. And I know that i need to do something with dialuge and clicking buttons. This is my code in action handler"
[code=java5]case 2465: // portal id c.getDH().sendOption5("kbd", "chaos", "jad", "dang, "gwd"); //options, just random, put in quickly break; [/code]
Where do I pute the options for if they click "KBD" or "chaos" etc. I sort of got it at one point but crashed client :|.

item.title: Multiple teleport options
